rComments: His classes are utterly brilliant with a dash of crazy, and a lot of innuendo mixed in. Sitting Andrew's lectures are like attending performances, but better. Seriously: the man is artful in his teaching abilities. Plus, he wears really bright colors and comes with an English accent. What more could you want in a professor?
One of the best teachers I've ever had.  Interesting, engaging, and really approachable during office hours.  Take his class even if you're not into anthro, you probably will be afterwards.

Mathews is hilarious! I took his states class on a recommendation and absolutely loved it. He makes everything interesting and provocative. The girl he was working with isn't a TA, I think she's a friend or old student that he's had for a while but I agree that she was great! Overall this was a great class that I enjoyed every day! Love Mathews!

Cool guy, cool class, i'll definitely take more with him because he really knows what he's talking about. I also liked his TA girl a lot but she wore bells around her wrist that were distracting sometimes.

This guy was amazing. He's a little bit of a space cadet at times, but his of humor in class and willingness to work with his students make it ok. I also liked his (TA/Assistant?) that would play the videos and answer questions when he wasn't there; she always knew exactly what he wanted and seemed to work very well with him. Overall, great class!

Too bad they don't make them like this very often. Hands down, best professor in the department, if not the university. He doesn't just shape minds, he changes lives and inspires people to do things they might not have otherwise thought they could. In short, I'm sincerely and unbelievably grateful that this man even exists.

Amazing doesn't even begin to cover it. I feel humbled and honored to have been taught by Andrew for the last year; he's one of the most brilliant people I've ever encountered and still he manages to make time for everyone that seeks him out. He comes with my highest recommendations.

Andrew is the best professor ever, not only he is super smart, accessible, helpful , charismatic he is beyond amazing.His only problem is that he does not teaches more classes, this is the kind of professor that inspires you to go to class, and he is so easy to pay attention to. i had an 8am class and i always woke up eager to listen to him!!!
Great Lecturer. I learned a lot.
Andrew is brilliant, approachable, available, socially and politically engaged and will not be forgotten.

Love Andrew. He pulls theories like a genius and takes other people's ideas  and turns them into brilliance. He's very witty, but if you cross the line, he can be catty as a preteen girl :) I would recommend Mathews to anyone who wanted a real teaching experience.

Andrew is my favorite professor so far. He's crystal clear on his expectations and rather willing to work with students on whatever they need. He's witty and beyond brilliant, if you get the chance, this is one professor you won't want to miss out on.

Dr. Mathews is one of the best Profs. I've ever had, and I also wish that he taught more courses. He's incredibly knowledgeable and puts ridiculous amounts of thought into everything he says. His awkward sense of humor and intense interest in what he's teaching keep the class interesting. Take Mathews if you get the chance, and GO to office hours.

Andrew Mathews is beyond amazing. Like some of his other students, the only problem i have is that he doesn't teach more classes. He took a while for me to figure out but i am so glad i took his class because i am now completely interested in topics i knew nothing about before. He's hysterical, entertaining, smart, and not bad to look at either. :)

Professor Mathews was AMAZING. He totally got me psyched about the subject, was an amazing lecturer, and is super funny! Take this class! It is life changing and just overall a great experience. Very interesting and engaging, and very approachable. He is one of the best professors in anthro!

Andrew Mathews is absolutely brilliant and his class was one of the best I've taken at UCSC. Plus, he's a pretty laid back about everything, including deadlines. There's a few group projects, reading responses, and a final paper. I definitely recommend his class to everyone. I just wish he taught more classes!

I positively adore Andrew. He is one of the best professors I've had so far and is remarkably intelligent. He is very worldly and politically aware. His English education shows(though his accent is unplaceable) through his dry but hilarious sense of humour. The class requires work, but it is interesting and worth it. Take Andrew, he's amazing.

Andrew was a great instructor. he knows and cares about the material which is important. The readings were great and he makes great connections. Plus he rides a bike and knows a LOT about Mexico as he has done research there. I highly recommend the course.
Wasn't willing to help me pass the class at all. Very mean.
